data.title: William “Bill” Goldwyn Nunn, III
data.text:
William “Bill” Goldwyn Nunn, III age 63 of Pittsburgh, PA passed away peacefully with his family by his side after a courageous battle with cancer on Saturday, September 24, 2016. Born on October 20, 1952, he is the son of Frances and the late William Goldwyn Nunn, Jr. Loving father of Jessica and Cydney Nunn and proud grandfather of Jordan. Cherished brother of Lynell. Dear uncle of Matthew Wilson. He was also blessed with many friends and relatives.

Bill was a veteran actor of stage screen and television. He will be dearly missed by all who knew and loved him.

A memorial service will be held at 6 PM, Sunday, October 9, 2016 at the August Wilson Center, 980 Liberty Avenue, Pittsburgh, PA 15222. Please RSVP at BillNunnTOP.com

In lieu of flowers, the family has designated the Bill Nunn Legacy Fund for memorial contributions in support of the Bill Nunn Theatre Outreach Project. Contributions may be sent and payable to:POISE FOUNDATION, 603 Stanwix Street, Suite 1700, Pittsburgh, PA 15222; or online at www.poisefoundation.org

Please view and sign the family’s guestbook at www.cremationfuneralcare.com.
